column5: Our place is close to Everything! Located between North Star Mall and The Quarry, we are 5 minutes from the airport (off the flight paths!), 15 minutes from downtown, and 25 from SeaWorld and Fiesta Texas. Youâ€™ll love our place because of the kitchen, the location, the coziness. It's good for couples, business travelers, families (with kids), and furry friends (pets).  This property has a separate airbnb with its own entrance. Search Little House near the Quarry in SA to view it.
